name: waterborne
description:
You are disturbed in the middle of the night by Beethoven's Fifth obnoxiously blasting from your phone and heavy rain drumming against the window. Wide awake, you decide to get up only to discover that a lot of drama has gone down while you were sleeping. A sense of dread builds as your cabin-in-the-woods weekend with friends slowly starts feeling suspiciously like a horror movie.

Waterborne is an atmospheric horror short visual novel submission for the "Spooktober 3rd Annual Visual Novel Jam". This is an 'abridged' version of a larger game and development will continue after the game jam judging period has ended. If You'd like to see updates to this game or other lazytiger projects, you can follow here or on twitter.

Comments and feedback welcomed. Feel free to link any lets plays or reviews etc. Very interested to see/hear/read reactions to the game.

  • 4500 word count
  • Estimated 30 mins of playtime
  • Unique art style
  • Amtospheric sound design

Made by lazytiger    |    Made in Ren'Py    |    Sounds from freesound.org
